solution_line_template: There are {grade_4_students} + {grade_5_students} = <<{grade_4_students}+{grade_5_students}={students_grade_4_and_5}>>{students_grade_4_and_5} students in Grades 4 and 5.
Therefore, there are {total_students} - {students_grade_4_and_5} = <<{total_students}-{students_grade_4_and_5}={students_grade_6}>>{students_grade_6} students in Grade 6.
